first_translate: then...
does that mean you won’t get engaged?
get engaged...?
I guess so! people usually do before they marry each other...
I guess so! people usually do before they marry each other...
maybe I’ll have to think about this now...

hangle: 피오나 영애는 늘 여러 의미로 느긋하네요….
first_translate: lady fiona is always laid-back when it comes to these things...
until recently, she was still deciding whether or not to break up with him!
well, there’s no need for me to rush into anything.
and besides, I’m not even sure if siegren has marriage on his mind right now...
not only that, but abel hasn’t come back yet either.

hangle: ‘저희 약혼할게요!’ 하면 무슨 반응이 나올지도 모르겠고.
first_translate: if we tell everyone “we’re getting married!” without discussing it first, he might react negatively.
siegren prohibited from entering after 8 p.m.
it looks like my time here is almost over.
I’d better go home.
why does he follow all those rules?!
the ones about being out by eight o’clock!!
is he some kind of middle schooler?!
but then again...
when siegren and I get married,
my father-in-law will be...
...the emperor.
what am I thinking?
a peaceful life among nobility where neither the crown prince nor the empress exist...
oh...
first off, I should ask siegren how he feels about this idea.
this new problem really threw me off guard.
no, nothing at all.
huh?
cain ereze seems flustered,

hangle: 그 앞에 선 건 대여섯 살은 차이 날 10대 후반의 소녀…
first_translate: while standing opposite him is a girl probably around ten years younger than him...
who could she be?
at one glance, I can see her status isn’t ordinary.
nor is she any noble lady whose face I recognize.
wait a minute...
do you think she used to date him?
if that were actually true, burying them both alive would be best...
...for the good of humanity.
y-your highness...!

hangle: 이제 훈련 시간이다. 뭘 하고 있지?
first_translate: training begins soon. what are you doing?
judging by their reactions, maybe it's true.
can I say...
“nice meeting you”?
good morning,
brother.
I'm your sister,
princess aria.
"brother"...?
that’s right.
even though I’ve never seen her before,
she wasn’t born to the main imperial family line.

hangle: 하급 귀족 출신 황비의 소생이라 했던가.
first_translate: apparently, she was the daughter of a low-ranking aristocrat.
ah!
forgive me for interrupting your training session, brother.

hangle: 예전 제 기사였던 케인 경과 이야기를 나누고 싶어서요.
first_translate: I wanted to talk to sir cain since he used to serve as my knight.
oh.
take him away for a bit if you must.

hangle: 케인은 황녀 궁의 기사였으니 주종 관계였군.
first_translate: right, cain served under the princess because he was once part of her palace guards.

hangle: 케인이 아비인 에레즈 후작의 수족 노릇을 하지 않는다더니.
first_translate: so that explains why he doesn’t work directly under his father, marquis ereze.
your highness...
perhaps that was the reason.
still, I don’t feel much toward her despite us sharing blood ties.

hangle: 어머니 외의 혈연은 없는 것과 마찬가지니까.
first_translate: to me, anyone outside of mother’s side of the family may as well be strangers.

hangle: 하지만 나와 황태자, 어느 쪽의 편에도 아직 서지 않고
first_translate: but if house ereze’s eldest son continues to take such an ambiguous stance...

hangle: 모호한 태도를 고수하는 에레즈의 장자가 끼어있다면…
first_translate: ...by refusing to support either myself or the crown prince,
they just might find themselves caught in our crossfire.
sister?
yes, apparently I had a half-sister.

hangle: 원작에서는 제대로 등장한 장면도 없던 존재였는데.
first_translate: in the original story, she didn’t make a single appearance.

hangle: 몸이 약하다며 나오지 않아 얼굴도 본적 없었는데.
first_translate: since she supposedly suffered poor health, she rarely left her room.
recently, however, she started going out more often.
you mean the first princess...?
then perhaps she recovered. thank goodness.

hangle: 글쎄, 처음부터 아픈 척을 했던 것일지도.
first_translate: I wouldn’t know. maybe she pretended to be sick from the start.
the timing fits too perfectly.
as soon as the empress and crown prince quietened down, she began making public appearances.
that means...
...she kept herself hidden while watching the empress closely.
of course.
if she got in the way, she would've been killed.

hangle: 의외로 이 황가에 직계 황족은 그리 많지 않았다.
first_translate: strangely enough, direct descendants of the royal family aren’t very common.
usually, women barely survive long enough...

hangle: 여자가 살아 있는 경우가 거의 없어.
first_translate: ...to give birth to children.

hangle: 황제가 손을 댄 여자와 그 아이를 처리한 것이다.
first_translate: the emperor disposed of every woman he slept with along with their offspring.

hangle: 하지만 황비는 어쨌든 하급이라고 해도 귀족이고,
first_translate: but although the late empress came from a lower rank within the nobility,

hangle: 그렇다고 뒷배경은 없으니 살려 둔 모양이야.
first_translate: she lacked connections, which is likely why she survived.

hangle: 황자가 아닌 황녀였으니, 그냥 내버려 둔 거구나.
first_translate: since she gave birth to a princess instead of a prince, she was simply ignored.

hangle: 게다가 납작 엎드려 있었다면 신경 쓸 가치도 없다 생각했겠지.
first_translate: on top of that, she remained loyal until the end, thus rendering her unworthy of attention.

hangle: 눈치도 있고, 자존심을 굽히고 기어야 할 때도 알고 있다.
first_translate: she knows exactly when to keep her head down and act humble.
so...

hangle: 새로운 세력 구도가 생겼다고 하는 거야?
first_translate: are you saying a new power dynamic emerged?
duke priscilla and marquess clovis.

hangle: 5 가문 중 중립을 지지하고 있는 귀족들이 수상해.
first_translate: out of the five families, the neutral nobles seem suspicious.
how certain are we that they truly remain impartial?

hangle: …그러네, 두 가문의 수장은 무리하게 중립을 지키고 있지.
first_translate: true, the leaders of those two houses insistently maintain neutrality.

hangle: 원작의 아렌트는 유니스에게 빠져, 지금과는 행보가 전혀 달랐다.

the same goes for duke priscilla.

if that assumption turns out correct,
we might need to nip this in the bud early on.
what do you want to do?
for now,
I'd rather observe further.

alright, suit yourself.
looks like you’re less concerned than I thought.

hangle: 아마 너나 나나 권력에 미련이 없기 때문 아닐까.
first_translate: probably because neither of us care about gaining power.
let’s see... next letter...
all I wish for is your happiness.
still, we can’t read minds.
perhaps I'll discuss this matter with abel--

abel...
